articles.title: ICE blocking Plymouth detainees from state court dates
articles.description: No federal immigration detainees housed at the Plymouth County Correctional Facility have been brought to their state court cases this year despite explicit requests from judges — a move that shows continued rising tensions on the heels of a controversial Sup…

articles.author: herald.staff, By Herald Staff
articles.title: Body of missing Mashpee man found in Plymouth
articles.description: PLYMOUTH — The body of a 64-year old Mashpee man has been found in Plymouth. The Cape and Islands District Attorney’s Office said yesterday that Raymond Perry’s body was found near the Carver line by officers from Mashpee, Plymouth and the state police. The s…

articles.author: Jordan Frias, By Jordan Frias
articles.title: Two face trafficking charges in drug bust
articles.description: Two men arrested this weekend in Whitman will be arraigned today in Brockton District Court on drug trafficking charges, cops said. Jon Vanrader Jr., 27, of Brockton and Reginald Sadm, 25, of New Bedford were arrested late Saturday night in Whitman, cops said…

articles.author: Owen Boss, By Owen Boss
articles.title: Suspect arrested in knife attack
articles.description: A Maine man accused of stabbing another man seven times in Bridgewater late Friday night is facing an attempted murder charge, police said. Adam Martinez, 41, of York, Maine, was arrested by officers responding to a reported stabbing on South Street about 11:…

articles.author: Laurel J. Sweet, By Laurel J. Sweet
articles.title: Everett man to be sentenced for role in plot to behead cops
articles.description: When the feds push life in prison for convicted terrorist David Daoud Wright tomorrow, the ISIS sympathizer’s public defenders want a corrections officer who guarded him in lockup for the past 2 1⁄2 years to take his side in the sentencing hearing.

articles.title: Brazilian still set on getting green card after being detained
